title: Arrange Shipping for a Customer Order
description: A logistics coordinator needs to arrange transportation for a completed customer order.

tasks.description: Identify the customer order that is ready for shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the sales order and confirms its status is 'Ready to Ship'.

tasks.description: Get freight quotes from approved carriers based on the shipment's weight, dimensions, and destination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives quotes from three different freight carriers.

tasks.description: Book the shipment with the most cost-effective carrier and generate the Bill of Lading (BOL).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books the shipment and prints the BOL for the driver.
